id: How the Khashoggi case and its fallout is affecting global business
paragraph: FOLLOW CNN BUSINESS By Taylor Nicole Rogers, CNN BusinessUpdated 3:31 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)The disappearance and death of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi sent shockwaves through the business world, leaving in limbo planned investments, partnerships and projects in banking, transportation and technology.Most stock quote data provided by BATS.
